articles.title: Tonga Volcanic Eruption Produced Ionospheric Hole and 'Bubbles' - Eos
articles.description: The 2022 Tonga volcano eruption altered the global ionosphere, creating a huge ionospheric hole locally near the epicenter and large-amplitude plasma bubbles remotely over the Asia-Oceania area.
